title: Israel Says Iran Tried to Fly Arms to Hamas Using Drones
sub_head: Israel says it shot down long-range drones launched from Iran last year as the U.S. and its allies close in on reviving Iranian nuclear deal
body:
Israel accused Iran of trying to use long-range drones to fly small arms to Palestinian militants in the West Bank and Gaza Strip in an evolution in Tehranâ€™s use of unmanned vehicles against its Middle East rival.
Israeli military officials said they used F-35 jet fighters to shoot down two drones launched from Iran in March last year, marking the first time the advanced planes have been used to bring down unmanned vehicles. On Monday, nearly a year after the incident, the Israeli military released video from the F-35s showing the shoot down of the drones and details of the subsequent investigation.
